very poor delivery experience. the order was delayed by over an hour, while the app kept showing misleading etas like ‚Äúarriving in 13 minutes‚Äù and then suddenly marking it as delayed. the delivery partner was completing grouped deliveries, and my food kept getting delayed and cold. support confirmed the order was already 29 minutes late, and the eta kept changing. a small promo code doesn‚Äôt justify the frustration. zomato needs better eta accuracy and transparency.
